text: Q.25 Consider the following C code: #include<stdio.h> int MadeEasy(int k) { static int count = 0; while(k) { count += (k&1)71: -1; k>>=1; } return count; } void main( ) { static int x = 0; for(int i = 5; i > 0; i--) x = x + MadeEasy(i); printf(â€œ%d\n", x); } The output of the above program is . Solution : 8 Value of Count upto this point Therefore the final value = (1+0+2+2+3)=8
